content: Are we meeting again tomorrow at the same time?
I'm planning on a meeting today in 1.5 hours!

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CX3-If9EBf4Sy0jHwcB2gpBsgbJNJU2PjC5yGyO7NPs/edit

2021/01/29 Backdrop LIVE
Backdrop LIVE (planning meeting) - Feb 5th, 2021 Tested Zoom break-out rooms -- sorta like them! Must be on zoom version 5.3+ in order to see (and self select) breakout rooms Otherwise, host must assign people to rooms Ideas: One main zoom “meeting” that goes for 3 hours. (3.5 hours? 4?) Man...
I was going to ask some questions, but I went and found that doc, and my questions were answered. :smile:
I should go get breakfast before the meeting.

@Joseph Flatt , @oadaeh (Jason Flatt) and I had a short meeting, but mostly just talked about two things.

1) Scheduling the next meeting - and trying to get some of our friends in Europe involved.
2) How we might help with the website.

@jenlampton

Since we are already having a VUG early in the day next week, we're thinking about the possibility of a VUG planning meeting either before or after that meeting. I hate to wait much longer. The goal is to identify who might be interested in helping arrange the European portion of our event this time and what needs to be done.

The VUG is next Tuesday at 9:00am Pacific Time.
https://backdropcms.org/news/events/virtual-user-group-multilingual-backdrop
Does anyone have any thoughts about trying for a 30 minute Backdrop LIVE meeting before or after that meeting?
We are meeting on Friday at 2:30 PM PACIFIC Time to test Zoom again. It would be nice to have 4-5 people there for a good test and practice run.
@jenlampton Can you be there. If not, we'll proceed anyway. I'll post a note in main Zulip stream tomorrow asking for anyone who is able to drop in and help us test.
Yes, I will add it to my calendar :)
Actually, it is already there so we should be good :)
hah, I see you just added it. thank you ;)
@Joseph Flatt and @oadaeh (Jason Flatt) said they could come
